text: XRP is trading at £2.08 today. As you can see, it's up 36% today, and up 8.6% in the last hour. People are waking up today mega rich. I mean, where can this stop? People are saying it's gonna hit £5, people are saying it's gonna hit £10, people are saying it's gonna hit £200. Comment below and let me know how much money you're in profit from today.
